choose.when: notice_title like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{pager.keyword}),'%') or notice_context like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{pager.keyword}),'%')

when.test: pager.keyword !='' and pager.keyword != null and pager.search != 'all'

mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM notice WHERE
notice_title like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{pager.keyword}),'%') or notice_context like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{pager.keyword}),'%') AND
${pager.search} LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{pager.keyword}),'%') AND
reg_date > CURRENT_DATE( );
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET ref=ref+1 where notice_code=#{noticeCode}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice ORDER BY notice_code DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET recommend=recommend+1 WHERE notice_code=#{noticeCode}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM nrecommend WHERE id=#{id} and notice_code=#{noticeCode}
